comment: Ran into this lady at a bar last night and she was super cool, even let me buy her a shot. I'm not an education major so I will never take her class but FYI, she's cooler than you think and she can down a shot with the best of them.

I took her class a couple semesters ago but ran into her today. She remembered me, encouraged me, & offered advice. She is great in my eyes. If you do the work you'll earn an A. I got a B, but I turned work in late because of personal issues. I kept her informed & she worked with me. She does care about her students. And she's a totally hot MILF.
The class was super easy to me, but things werent clear. I thought I did wrong, but it came out perfect. I did enjoy the class.

Was not the biggest fan of this professor.  She seemed to be very disorganized and was not very clear in explaining things.  Some assignments were useless and some were very difficult to do because they were not explained very well.  If you want a very good understanding from your curriculum class, dont take her.
Fun, dynamic, interesting, and wants the best for all of her students!

Excellent teacher, very very accommodating, caring.  Gives real example from books, uses textbook for teaching, involves everybody.  Democratic and fun. Attentive, willing to speak to students one on one, and helpful and understanding to each and every student.  Fantastic individual attention even if before classes start in her office.

If reciting from the book is teaching, then she's great! Most unorganized person ever! WILL NOT help you at all! Does not prepare you for anything but busy work. She doesn't even know what she assigns, and gives no direction or explanation at all! I also think she's arrogant. Maybe she's a good 3rd grd. teacher but is horrible at the college level

Do NOT take this lady! She's very disorganized, never e-mails you back, gives out work never explains it, way too much work. I'm telling you if you want to have a life don't take her. She's nice but trust me when I tell you this Don't take her.

She is VERY disorganized. She graded the same assignment twice with two different grades. She is always changing things leaves everyone confused and annoyed.  She also has favorites!  Very scatterbrained and very fake!

Totally disorganized.  Clearly picks favorites and doesn't hesitate to show it.  I was very excited about taking this class, but it has been a total waste of my time due to her inability to communicate well.

What are they talking about! Easy A, but you def walk away with valuable information. Ended up giving us a binder full of great worksheets to use with students. Is one of the teachers who is actually PREPARING us for "real" life!
She is absolutely excellent, must take this class if you do the work you will make an A, She is a world class teacher who cares about her students.

Very nice but totally disorganized. The grading wasnt very fair because she never told you what to do, she just expected you to magically know what she wants. Completely disorganized, I didn't get any grades until the end of the semester. Don't take her!
This was a lot of work for a two hour class. There was always a paper to write. She only had deadlines on certain ones though. I thought that she graded them fairly.

What an awful class and teacher!She was very nice, and meant well,but also teaches 3rd grade and it just seemed like she doesn't have time for her college students.I worked hard and turned everything in and had a B+.Many students were frustrated and never knew when assignments were due, also, many of us were very shocked at how she graded something
